mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.id AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", c.name AS "createBy.companyDTO.name", o.name AS "createBy.officeDTO.name" FROM sys_log a left JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by left JOIN sys_office c ON c.id = u.company_id left JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
